[ Packaging ] Minimum amount of packaging. (1) pair of shoes, wrapped in plastic  [ The Good ] This beige color is great. It has a sporty, almost boot-like appearance. The traction on the bottom is nice; lots of grip. The styling itself is pretty good, the materials make these shoes a medium-grade type of shoe. They are super comfy. The size of the shoes themselves are on the bulkier side, so I would suggest users get a more true-to-size fit for themselves. There is plenty of breathing room inside of the shoes.  [ What Could Be Better ] I have no complaints.  [ Takeaway ] If you’re looking for a more-urban style pair of shoes, these are good! Perfect for a casual night out, and can somewhat dress up. Can walk in these shoes for a long time without fatigue.
